<?php
 namespace blobfolio\wp\wh\vendor\phone\data; class dataCR extends data { const CODE = 'CR'; const PREFIX = 506; const REGION = 'South America'; const PATTERNS = array( '(?:8\d|90)\d{8}|[24-8]\d{7}', ); const TYPES = array( '210[7-9]\d{4}|2(?:[024-7]\d|1[1-9])\d{5}'=>array( 'fixed', ), '6500[01]\d{3}|5(?:0[01]|7[0-3])\d{5}|(?:6[0-4]|7[0-3]|8[3-9])\d{6}'=>array( 'mobile', ), '800\d{7}'=>array( 'toll_free', ), '90[059]\d{7}'=>array( 'premium_rate', ), '(?:210[0-6]|4\d{3}|5100)\d{4}'=>array( 'voip', ), ); const FORMATS = array( '(\d{4})(\d{4})'=>'$1 $2', '(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{4})'=>'$1-$2-$3', ); }
